DESCRIPTION: Absolute-value function. The absolute value of a number is the number without its sign.
EXAMPLE: <h3>Abs Example</h3> <p>The absolute value of the following numbers: 1,3,-4,-3.2,6 is <cfoutput> #Abs(1)#,#Abs(3)#,#Abs(-4)#,#Abs(-3.2)#,#Abs(6)# </cfoutput> <p>The absolute value of a number is the number without its sign.</p>
